#summary Additional  resources

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

We are done planning and implementing a GWT/GAE [http://cultureshows.appspot.com/ application] for managing performances schedule for a theater, with reasonable quality. Theater owners are authenticating with OpenID and are scheduling performances, which are displayed on their own websites.

Hopefully, this is just the start of a great journey for you. Here are more places to travel to :)
